prompts: Create a playful feline Pokemon with shiny golden eyes and a mischievous grin.
I want a cartoonish cat-like Pokemon that loves to steal shiny objects.
Generate a small, agile Pokemon that excels in urban environments and has a sneaky personality.
Make a cute Pokemon with a unique charm that attracts trainers with its stealing abilities.
Imagine a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of playful mischief and loves to explore cities.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in grassy areas, known for its quick movements and clever tricks.
Show me a Pokemon with a distinctive gold coin feature, representing fortune and luck.
